::KitKat/GoldenEye::

GoldenEye took a hit in the chest and fell over on the ground.  
KitKat grabbed GoldenEye and looked at her.  The wound was near the 
spark, but missed it by an inch.  She picked up GoldenEye and took 
her to the entrance of the cave.  She put her just inside the door of 
the base, out of harms way.  "Someone take her to the CR.  She's hit."
GoldenEye sat slumped over near the entrance with bullet holes in her 
sides, chest, legs and wings.  She was leaking badly.

KitKat ran back outside and continued to spray the Maximals with gun 
fire.  She took a few more hits in the shoulders and hip.  She 
groaned in pain, but continued to stand her ground.  This was her 
base and she wasn't giving up. She was leaking badly, but she didn't 
care.  She wsan't going to let a slagging maximal drive her from her 
own base.
